data.oai_dc:dc: Allele-specific mRNA SNP counts for Arabidopsis embryo and endosperm

The number of mRNA-seq reads matching each Col-Ler, Col-Cvi, or Ler-Cvi SNP is reported for data from ColxLer, LerxCol, ColxCvi, CvixCol, LerxCvi, and CvixLer embryo and endosperm dissected 6 days after pollination, along with ColxCvi and CvixCol whole seeds.
